content.text: Match ends, Leicester City 2, Everton 0.
Second Half ends, Leicester City 2, Everton 0.
Christian Fuchs (Leicester City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Tom Davies (Everton).
Offside, Everton. Dominic Calvert-Lewin tries a through ball, but Oumar Niasse is caught offside.
Substitution, Leicester City. Kelechi Iheanacho replaces Jamie Vardy.
Attempt missed. Leighton Baines (Everton) left footed shot from outside the box is just a bit too high.
Attempt blocked. Dominic Calvert-Lewin (Everton) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Oumar Niasse.
Attempt missed. Vicente Iborra (Leicester City) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Jamie Vardy with a cross.
Corner,  Everton. Conceded by Wes Morgan.
Substitution, Leicester City. Marc Albrighton replaces Ben Chilwell.
Corner,  Leicester City. Conceded by Beni Baningime.
Offside, Leicester City. Wilfred Ndidi tries a through ball, but Jamie Vardy is caught offside.
Attempt blocked. Phil Jagielka (Everton) header from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Gylfi Sigurdsson with a cross.
Corner,  Everton. Conceded by Danny Simpson.
Attempt blocked. Dominic Calvert-Lewin (Everton) header from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Jonjoe Kenny with a cross.
Offside, Leicester City. Harry Maguire tries a through ball, but Ben Chilwell is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Oumar Niasse (Everton) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Leighton Baines.
Jamie Vardy (Leicester City) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Phil Jagielka (Everton).
Substitution, Leicester City. Shinji Okazaki replaces Riyad Mahrez.
Substitution, Everton. Gylfi Sigurdsson replaces Wayne Rooney.
Corner,  Everton. Conceded by Danny Simpson.
Corner,  Everton. Conceded by Christian Fuchs.
Corner,  Everton. Conceded by Wes Morgan.
Attempt blocked. Oumar Niasse (Everton) left footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Idrissa Gueye.
Attempt missed. Wayne Rooney (Everton) header from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Jonjoe Kenny with a cross.
Idrissa Gueye (Everton) is shown the yellow card.
Tom Davies (Everton) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Vicente Iborra (Leicester City).
Attempt saved. Phil Jagielka (Everton) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner.

Attempt missed. Jamie Vardy (Leicester City) left footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Wes Morgan with a headed pass.
Foul by Oumar Niasse (Everton).
Danny Simpson (Leicester City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

Foul by Wayne Rooney (Everton).

Attempt blocked. Idrissa Gueye (Everton) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Wayne Rooney.
Offside, Leicester City. Demarai Gray tries a through ball, but Jamie Vardy is caught offside.
Substitution, Everton. Beni Baningime replaces Aaron Lennon.
Substitution, Everton. Oumar Niasse replaces Kevin Mirallas.
Second Half begins Leicester City 2, Everton 0.
First Half ends, Leicester City 2, Everton 0.

Leighton Baines (Everton) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Demarai Gray (Leicester City).
Goal!  Leicester City 2, Everton 0. Demarai Gray (Leicester City) right footed shot from a difficult angle and long range on the left to the top right corner. Assisted by Christian Fuchs.

Goal!  Leicester City 1, Everton 0. Jamie Vardy (Leicester City) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the high centre of the goal. Assisted by Riyad Mahrez following a fast break.
Idrissa Gueye (Everton) wins a free kick on the right wing.
